Text:
Robin Trower didn't "channel" Jimi Hendrix !  
He was an equally skilled blues guitarist, who in his early years was a contemporary to Jimi.

But that's OK. We know you didn't write that review... Thanks for the CD! :)
Thanks for this "Vman" nice upload.IMHO Robin Trower is a criminally underrated guitarest.He is who is and he´s bloody good:)
